name: Local Filesystem
description: Support for music files that are present on a local accessible disk/folder.

config_entries.label: Action when a track is missing the Albumartist ID3 tag
config_entries.description: Music Assistant prefers information stored in ID3 tags and only uses online sources for additional metadata. This means that the ID3 tags need to be accurate, preferably tagged with MusicBrainz Picard.
